content: for blocking **gauge** 18 sts x 24 row = 10 cm / 4 in stockinette stitch after blocking 21 sts x 24 row = 10 cm / 4 in textured pattern not blocked 18 sts x 24 row = 10 cm / 4 in textured pattern after blocking featured sample has not been blocked *a huge thank to florence folfloche for her help *
